We’ll also hear from Citizens United President Dave Bossie, veteran GOP strategist Hogan Gidley, conservative marketing strategist Matt Palumbo, SiriusXM’s POTUS Politics host Jared Rizzi, and Center for Security Policy President and Cruz foreign policy adviser Frank Gaffney.
